topic.title: Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector Add-on

body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector add-on allows you to connect the Oxygen AI Positron add-on with Vertex AI from Google Cloud. This add-on contributes a Vertex AI Service option in the AI Connector combo box of the AI Positron. The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector add-on is compatible with Oxygen XML Editor/Author/Developer version 27.1 or newer.

section.title: Installation
section.p:
To install this add-on, follow these steps:
Go to Help Install new add-ons to open the add-on selection dialog box. Enter or paste https://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Addons/default/updateSite.xml in the Show add-ons from field or select it from the drop-down menu.
Select the Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector add-on and click Next.
Result: The Vertex AI Service will be available in the AI Connector combo box in the Plugins Oxygen AI Positron AI Service Configuration preferences page.

Alternatively, you can install the add-on by downloading the JAR file from the Releases page and unzipping it inside {oXygenInstallDir}/plugins. Ensure there are no intermediate folders and that the plugin.xml file is present in the correct location.

section.title: How to Configure the Vertex AI Service Connector
section.p:
When the Vertex AI Service is selected from the AI Service Configuration preferences page, the following configuration options are available:
Project ID The ID of your Google Cloud project.
Location The location of your Google Cloud project (e.g., us-central1).
Model The AI model to use (e.g., google/gemini-2.5-flash).
Credential The content of the Google credential JSON file. The connector supports using a service account key file for authentication. If this field is left empty, the application will use Google Cloudâ€™s Application Default Credentials (documentation), searching for credentials in the following locations:
GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS environment variable.
The attached service account.
